message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $145.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $130?
Hi Bob, I understand your position. How about we meet in the middle at $137?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, would it be possible to lower the price to $135?
